32.eng-name: The Book of Jihad and Expeditions

hadiths.text: It has been narrated on the authority of Salama who said:I joined seven military expeditions led by the Messenger of Allah himself (ﷺ), and nine expeditions which he sent out once under Abu Bakr and once under Usama b. Zaid

chapter.ara-name: باب عَدَدِ غَزَوَاتِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: The number of campaigns of the Prophet (ﷺ)
